Estimate restoration using PC

Source: R/MK_dPCIIC.R
nodes_dPC_res.Rd

Estimate restoration using PC

nodes_dPC_res(
  idres = NULL,
  graph_n = NULL,
  attrib_n = NULL,
  num = NULL,
  G1 = 1000,
  min_nodes = 2000,
  parallel = NULL,
  parallel_mode = 0,
  intern = FALSE
)

Arguments

idres

integer. Id patches = 0

graph_n

Graph from cppRouting package

attrib_n

numeric. Nodes attribute

num

numeric. numPC ID patches = 1

G1

numeric

min_nodes

numeric

parallel

numeric

parallel_mode

numeric

intern

logical
